title: Spaghetti Carbonara
summary: A classic Italian pasta dish with eggs, cheese, bacon, and black pepper.
instructions: Cook spaghetti according to package instructions.
Fry pancetta in a pan until crispy.
Mix eggs with grated Pecorino and Parmesan.
Combine pasta with pancetta and egg mixture. Stir well.
Season with black pepper and serve.
